brokerProfiles.companyOverview: Nationwide healthcare M&A for $1M–$10M medical practice sales. Only MCBI in IBBA. Sell?side, valuations, financing, and tax?efficient exits. 85% of engagements close within 12 months with 95% valuation precision. Ethical, client?centered transactions that protect legacy and maximize value.
brokerProfiles.introduction:
Strategic Medical Brokers is a powerhouse of medical practice transition specialists, bringing together decades of collective experience in the healthcare sector. We serve as trusted allies for healthcare providers, aiding them in navigating the complex transition journey, from active practice to retirement.

Our mission transcends beyond a standard brokerage service. We aim to provide personalized, comprehensive transition solutions, designed to help our clients achieve their goals. We acknowledge the intricacies involved in selling a medical practice and our unwavering commitment is to ensure a seamless, stress-free transition experience for our clients.

Our team, a unique blend of experienced attorneys, medical practice brokers, marketing experts, and financial analysts, collaborates to deliver solutions that are tailored to meet the distinct needs and aspirations of our clients.

Founded: Genuine Business Advisors (GBA) was established by its founder, John Gleason, driven by a vision to transform how business owners navigate critical transitions such as sales or acquisitions. 

Purpose and Mission: GBA was created to deliver tailored, high-value solutions for business owners pursuing mergers and acquisitions (M&A). By focusing on strategic planning, precise execution, and client-specific goals, GBA ensures successful outcomes that maximize value and align with long-term objectives.

What Sets GBA Apart:
	• Proprietary 7-Step Process: GBA’s structured 7-step process guides clients through every stage of a transaction—from valuation and marketing to due diligence and closing—ensuring efficiency, transparency, and customized outcomes tailored to each client’s timeline and goals.
	• Sister Accounting Services Company: GBA’s sister accounting services (excluding tax) company enhances its offerings by streamlining clients’ financial records and elevating record keeping standards to meet rigorous financial reporting requirements, ensuring businesses are transaction-ready.
	• Industry Expertise and Client Commitment: Founded to redefine the M&A experience, GBA leverages deep industry knowledge and a collaborative network of professionals to treat clients as partners, not transactions. This dedication delivers personalized strategies for sales, acquisitions, or legacy planning, driving lasting success.
value.brokerIntroduction:
John Gleason, CEO of Genuine Business Advisors (GBA), brings personal experience in Mergers & Acquisitions (M&A) from having founded and grown his own Massachusetts manufacturing firm before selling it to one of the nations largest and most successful  private equity firms.  John then entered the M & A world in 2000 and worked his way up to become a Senior Vice President with a large national M & A advisory firm based in Manhattan. 
 
John founded GBA to deliver a holistic, personalized, client-centered approach. By combining M&A experience with the expertise of his skilled team, GBA ensures tailored strategies that encompass strategic planning, buyer identification, valuation and deal execution for successful outcomes. John’s sister accounting services firm supports GBA clients by completing and clarifying financial records to meet rigorous reporting standards, ensuring businesses are transaction-ready. As a trusted consultant , John drives unique, value-focused solutions to achieve lasting client success.

item.name: John Gleason
item.description:
John Gleason, CEO of Genuine Business Advisors (GBA), brings personal experience in Mergers & Acquisitions (M&A) from having founded and grown his own Massachusetts manufacturing firm before selling it to one of the nations largest and most successful  private equity firms.  John then entered the M & A world in 2000 and worked his way up to become a Senior Vice President with a large national M & A advisory firm based in Manhattan. 
 
John founded GBA to deliver a holistic, personalized, client-centered approach. By combining M&A experience with the expertise of his skilled team, GBA ensures tailored strategies that encompass strategic planning, buyer identification, valuation and deal execution for successful outcomes. John’s sister accounting services firm supports GBA clients by completing and clarifying financial records to meet rigorous reporting standards, ensuring businesses are transaction-ready. As a trusted consultant , John drives unique, value-focused solutions to achieve lasting client success.

worksFor.name: Supporting Strategies
worksFor.description:
Founded: Genuine Business Advisors (GBA) was established by its founder, John Gleason, driven by a vision to transform how business owners navigate critical transitions such as sales or acquisitions. 

Purpose and Mission: GBA was created to deliver tailored, high-value solutions for business owners pursuing mergers and acquisitions (M&A). By focusing on strategic planning, precise execution, and client-specific goals, GBA ensures successful outcomes that maximize value and align with long-term objectives.

What Sets GBA Apart:
	• Proprietary 7-Step Process: GBA’s structured 7-step process guides clients through every stage of a transaction—from valuation and marketing to due diligence and closing—ensuring efficiency, transparency, and customized outcomes tailored to each client’s timeline and goals.
	• Sister Accounting Services Company: GBA’s sister accounting services (excluding tax) company enhances its offerings by streamlining clients’ financial records and elevating record keeping standards to meet rigorous financial reporting requirements, ensuring businesses are transaction-ready.
	• Industry Expertise and Client Commitment: Founded to redefine the M&A experience, GBA leverages deep industry knowledge and a collaborative network of professionals to treat clients as partners, not transactions. This dedication delivers personalized strategies for sales, acquisitions, or legacy planning, driving lasting success.
